item.title: Gerhard & Renuka
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: We went into Seattle (again) yesterday and over to the Eastside. Went to Crate & Barrel and bought a couple sets of glasses and then to Staples for (free) office supplies. Then to Gerhard & Tracy's housewarming party at their new house in Lakemont. Then we went to dinner at Brasa with Renuka Abayanayaka -- he quit and is leaving for Sri Lanka on Monday!
